wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Scurrah Randles (25 December 1857 – 11 February 1945) was a British businessman and Conservative politician.

response: The Conservative candidate was Sir John Scurrah Randles, an industrialist in the coal and steel business. He had been MP for Cockermouth until his defeat in December 1910.
A General Election was due to take place by the end of 1915. By the autumn of 1914, the following candidates had been adopted to contest that election. Unionist: Sir John Scurrah Randles,
